name: AI_SetCondition_OnHouseInRange
documentation: Sets the given condition of the given player based on house found and (other stuff).

parameters.name: EverActive
numberHints: Resets the condition back to false when read.

parameters.name: OnlyEnemy
parameters.documentation: Condition only matches if diplomatic relationship to THIS player is enemy.

parameters.name: HouseType
parameters.documentation: Condition only matches if a house of certain type is found.
numberHints: Only vehicle (in blueprint; else not a building)

parameters.name: FinishedOnly
parameters.documentation: Condition only matches if a house is completely built.
